src:
【全文】張書豪認愛妮妮對話洩密　歐陽娜娜偷交陳凱歌兒子曝光
02 Nov 2019, 23:28 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
歐陽娜娜去年18歲的生日過後，正式擺脫父親歐陽龍的「禁愛令」，果然生日過後不到半年，她就交到了男朋友。日前張書豪認愛歐陽妮妮時，po出與歐陽娣娣的對話截圖，洩密了娜娜已有男友，而本刊獲得線報，直指歐陽娜娜的男友就是中國大陸導演陳凱歌的兒子陳飛宇，陳飛宇追求她超過兩年，如今總算靠著一首歌虜獲佳人芳心。



歐陽娜娜與陳飛宇祕交曝光，起因於她未來姊夫張書豪的一則認愛留言，事後網友推測，不僅姊姊歐陽妮妮在談戀愛，歐陽娜娜也正熱戀中。據悉，歐陽娜娜的男友是與她同年的陳飛宇，只是雙方演藝事業正好，戀情無法「官宣」，只能偷偷交往。



張書豪（左）與歐陽妮妮（右）因拍電視劇《腦波小姐》擦出愛火。（翻攝自張書豪IG）



張書豪在臉書po出對話截圖又秒刪，不僅形同認愛歐陽妮妮，也意外曝光歐陽娜娜也有了男友。（翻攝自張書豪臉書）


上週歐陽妮妮男友張書豪在臉書上貼出一則與歐陽娣娣的對話截圖，對話中，娣娣祝他生日快樂，張書豪留言「真的很開心愛上姊姊然後多了你們」，等於認證了他與歐陽妮妮的戀情，而截圖中娣娣的「等我交到男朋友，我們三個跟各自男朋友，帶著媽媽出去玩」更有玄機，被解讀連歐陽娜娜也在戀愛ing。


歐陽娜娜出道就打著才女人設，相較其他白富美也更有氣質，難怪一堆小鮮肉為之傾倒。（翻攝自歐陽娜娜IG）


　

熱情舉動　認證準媳婦
其實歐陽娜娜與陳飛宇不僅戀愛中，也早已獲得雙方父母的同意，尤其陳飛宇的媽媽陳紅更是對未來媳婦十分滿意。有劇組人員爆料，歐陽娜娜曾赴《我和我的祖國》片場探陳飛宇的班，陳紅一見到歐陽娜娜來了，便為她搬椅子，讓她與準公公陳凱歌坐在一起，這親熱的舉動令旁觀的人無不傻眼。


陳飛宇（右）背景強大，爸爸是名導陳凱歌（左），媽媽也是曾被稱為「第一美女」的女星陳紅（中）。（翻攝自陳飛宇微博）

陳飛宇的明星媽媽陳紅可是出了名的強勢，過往就有小咖女星曾想藉著蹭陳飛宇搏上位，被陳紅辣手封殺，如今陳紅居然對歐陽娜娜有這麼猶如一家人的行為，可見陳凱歌夫婦早已認可了對方。


歐陽娜娜（右）與陳飛宇（左）在2017年電影《秘果》組CP，兩人的互動也充滿粉紅泡泡，甜到令人嫉妒。

陳飛宇自從3年前和歐陽娜娜合作《秘果》，就為她的「有氣質」大為傾倒，當時他剛出道，不太懂得隱藏自己的愛意，對她投去的眼神都充滿了粉紅泡泡，讓粉絲覺得事有蹊蹺，網上還流傳一支陳飛宇與歐陽娜娜合唱劉若英〈後來〉的影片，短短1分多鐘，陳飛宇簡直管不住自己的眼睛，忍不住瞄了歐陽娜娜十幾次之多。






TFBOYS的王源（圖）與《唐人街探案》的劉昊然都傳追過歐陽娜娜，如今劉昊然已出局，而王源與娜娜則都在伯克利音樂學院求學。（東方IC）



TFBOYS的王源與《唐人街探案》的劉昊然（圖）都傳追過歐陽娜娜，如今劉昊然已出局，而王源與娜娜則都在伯克利音樂學院求學。（東方IC）


　
配件同款　搭機睡肩上
雖然陳飛宇對娜娜關懷備至，禮物鮮花攻勢不斷，但歐陽娜娜只把他當成兩小無猜的朋友。去年陳飛宇出演親子實境秀《想想辦法吧爸爸》當實習爸爸，他為了示愛，自彈自唱了一首約翰梅爾的歌來表白。
一起錄影的大陸女星戚薇問他為什麼要選這首歌？陳飛宇居然公然說：「因為這是我最喜歡的女生的偶像的歌！」而眾所皆知歐陽娜娜的偶像正是約翰梅爾，這句話讓娜娜很是心動，未久，「飛娜」超顏值CP正式成形。
今年下半年，歐陽娜娜與陳飛宇的戀情愈傳愈烈，本月18日2人繼9月被發現穿了同一件軍裝外套後，又再次穿了同款黑色毛領外套錄影片。在此之前雙方戴同款項鍊、情侶配飾和情侶大頭像等，早已被抓包到抓不勝抓。



儘管不肯鬆口認戀情，但歐陽娜娜9月才被抓包穿了陳飛宇的外套，日前又被發現穿同款毛領外套。（翻攝自微博）



儘管不肯鬆口認戀情，但歐陽娜娜9月才被抓包穿了陳飛宇的外套，日前又被發現穿同款毛領外套。（翻攝自微博）



儘管不肯鬆口認戀情，但歐陽娜娜9月才被抓包穿了陳飛宇的外套，日前又被發現穿同款毛領外套。（翻攝自微博）



儘管不肯鬆口認戀情，但歐陽娜娜9月才被抓包穿了陳飛宇的外套，日前又被發現穿同款毛領外套。（翻攝自微博）


10月初2人參加巴黎時裝週，相隔8小時連被網友野生捕獲2次，還有目擊者爆料，見到娜娜與陳飛宇一起搭機，女方很自然地將頭枕在男生肩膀上安睡，男生則是一臉幸福的寵溺。
「飛娜戀」最精采的八卦，則是一段「白富美霸凌台灣妹，男友護花槓上頂流小生」的故事。以陳飛宇俊俏外型、身高188公分，爸爸在圈中又有勢力，自然吸引不少有錢妹子垂涎。據傳他出道後，身家超過新台幣500億元的耀萊集團董事長千金綦美合曾對陳飛宇很有好感，當時歐陽娜娜還是她的閨密，於是綦美合便請娜娜幫忙拉攏，沒想到最後，陳飛宇不但不理這些千金，還成了娜娜微博的點讚狂人。


歐陽娜娜（左）曾經打進富二代綦美合（右）、王文也（中）的閨密團，卻因為陳飛宇慘遭白富美們霸凌。（翻攝自Evetinana微博）


　

為愛翻臉　閨密隔空嗆
從小被當公主捧的綦美合自然忍不下這口氣，聯合另一位閨密、也是大陸重量級片商華誼兄弟老闆之一王中磊的女兒王文也將歐陽娜娜踢出閨密團，她的姐妹團成員也在IG開罵歐陽娜娜：「嘴上還尼瑪說幫忙臥槽真是噁心死我了。」


綦美合的閨密在IG大罵歐陽娜娜噁心，又用「BITCH」稱呼她。（翻攝自lilliannewu IG）

但歐陽娜娜也不是省油的燈，在微博暗諷綦美合是「為追星不惜獻身」的「骨肉皮」，雙方徹底翻臉。而陳飛宇疑似要為歐陽娜娜出氣，不顧自己也是公眾人物身分，公開按讚追求綦美合的當紅鮮肉王一博黑圖，也算是向事業上的競爭對手宣戰。



歐陽娜娜曾在微博po出陳綺貞《吉他手》專輯封面，疑似暗諷綦美合是為追星不惜獻身的「骨肉皮」。（翻攝自歐陽娜娜微博）



歐陽娜娜曾在微博po出陳綺貞《吉他手》專輯封面，疑似暗諷綦美合是為追星不惜獻身的「骨肉皮」。（翻攝自歐陽娜娜微博）


更新時間｜2019.10.29 12:18
text:
[Full Text] Zhang Shuhao recognizes Aini's dialogue and leaks Ouyang Nana steals Chen Kaige's son exposure
02 Nov 2019, 23:28 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
After Ouyang Nana’s 18-year-old birthday last year, she officially got rid of her father’s Ouyang Long’s “Forbidden Love Order”. After half a birthday, she made her boyfriend. A few days ago, when Zhang Shuhao recognized Ouyang Nini, he took a screenshot of Ouyang Yu’s conversation and leaked Nana’s boyfriend. The magazine received a line report, pointing to Ouyang Nana’s boyfriend, Chen Feiyu, the son of Chinese mainland director Chen Kaige. Chen Feiyu pursued her for more than two years, and now she has finally won a beautiful heart with a song.



Ouyang Nana and Chen Feiyu secretly exposed, caused by her future coward Zhang Shuhao's love message, after the netizen speculated that not only Ouyang Nini is in love, Ouyang Nana is also in love. It is reported that Ouyang Nana's boyfriend is Chen Feiyu in the same year as her. It is just that the acting careers of both parties are just right. The relationship cannot be "official declaration" and can only secretly communicate.



Zhang Shuhao (left) and Ouyang Nini (right) wiped out the love fire for the TV series "Miss Bo Brain". (Reviewed from Zhang Shuhao IG)



Zhang Shuhao in the face of the po out of the dialogue screenshot and second delete, not only the same as the love of Ouyang Nini, but also accidentally exposed Ouyang Nana also has a boyfriend. (Reflected from Zhang Shuhao's Facebook)


Last week, Ouyang Nini’s boyfriend Zhang Shuhao posted a screenshot of his conversation with Ouyang Yu on Facebook. In the conversation, I wish him a happy birthday. Zhang Shuhao’s message “I’m really happy to fall in love with you and then more”, equal to Certified his love affair with Ouyang Nini, and the screenshot "I waited for my boyfriend, three of our boyfriends, went out to play with my mother" is more mysterious, interpreted even Ouyang Nana Love ing.


When Ouyang Nana debuted, she was a woman, and she was more temperament than other Bai Fumei. It is no wonder that a bunch of small fresh meat was dumped. (Reviewed from Ouyang Nana IG)




Passionate act
In fact, Ouyang Nana and Chen Feiyu not only love, but also have the consent of both parents, especially Chen Feiyu's mother Chen Hong is very satisfied with the future wife. Some crew members broke the news. Ouyang Nana went to the class of "I and my motherland" to explore Chen Feiyu's class. When Chen Hongyi saw Ouyang Nana, she moved her chair and let her sit with the prospective father Chen Kaige. The affectionate move made the onlookers all dumbfounded.


Chen Feiyu (right) has a strong background. Dad is the famous director Chen Kaige (left). Her mother is also known as the "first beauty" actress Chen Hong (middle). (Reviewed from Chen Feiyu Weibo)

Chen Feiyu’s star mother Chen Hong is notoriously strong. In the past, there was a small coffee actress who wanted to beat Chen Feiyu to take the position and was blocked by Chen Hong’s hot hand. Now Chen Hong actually has such a family behavior as Ouyang Nana. It can be seen that the Chen Kaige couple have already recognized each other.


Ouyang Nana (right) and Chen Feiyu (left) in the 2017 film "Secret Fruit" group CP, the interaction between the two is also full of pink bubbles, sweet to embarrassing.

Chen Feiyu has been dumping her "temperament" since she cooperated with Ouyang Nana three years ago. At that time, he just debuted, and he did not know how to hide his love. The eyes cast on her were full. The pink bubble makes fans feel that there is something wrong with it. On the Internet, Chen Feiyu and Ouyang Nana sang Liu Ruoying’s later film. In just over a minute, Chen Feiyu couldn’t control his eyes and couldn’t help but aim. Ouyang Nana is a dozen times.






Wang Yuan (pictured) of TFBOYS and Liu Yuran of "Chinatown Detective" have all passed through Ouyang Nana, and now Liu Yuran has been out, while Wang Yuan and Nana are both studying at the Berkeley Conservatory. (Oriental IC)



Wang Yuan of TFBOYS and Liu Yuran (pictured) of "Chinatown Detective Case" have all passed through Ouyang Nana. Now Liu Yiran has been out, and both Wang Yuan and Nana are studying at the Berkeley Conservatory. (Oriental IC)



Accessories with the same paragraph
Although Chen Feiyu cares about Nana, the gift flowers are on the offensive, but Ouyang Nana only regards him as a friend of two small guesses. Last year, Chen Feiyu appeared in the parent-child reality show "Think about the way to Dad" as an internship father. He showed his love and sang a song by John Mel.
The mainland actress Rose, who was videotaping together, asked him why he chose this song? Chen Feiyu said openly: "Because this is the song of my favorite girl's idol!" It is well known that Ouyang Nana's idol is John Mayer. This sentence makes Nana very heart-felt, not long, " Feina's super-value CP is officially formed.
In the second half of this year, the relationship between Ouyang Nana and Chen Feiyu became more and more fierce. On the 18th of this month, after being found wearing the same military uniform in September, the two men wore the same black fur collar jacket video again. Prior to this, the two sides wearing the same necklace, couple accessories and couples big heads, etc., have already been caught and caught.



Although he refused to confess his affair, Ouyang Nana was caught in the coat of Chen Feiyu in September, and was found to wear the same fur collar jacket. (Reflected from Weibo)



Although he refused to confess his affair, Ouyang Nana was caught in the coat of Chen Feiyu in September, and was found to wear the same fur collar jacket. (Reflected from Weibo)



Although he refused to confess his affair, Ouyang Nana was caught in the coat of Chen Feiyu in September, and was found to wear the same fur collar jacket. (Reflected from Weibo)



Although he refused to confess his affair, Ouyang Nana was caught in the coat of Chen Feiyu in September, and was found to wear the same fur collar jacket. (Reflected from Weibo)


At the beginning of October, two people participated in the Paris Fashion Week. They were captured by the netizens twice in 8 hours. There were also witnesses who broke the news. When they saw Nana and Chen Feiyu, the woman naturally put her head on the shoulders of the boys and slept, boys. It is a happy face.
The most splendid gossip of "Fei Na Lian" is a story of "Bai Fumei bullying Taiwanese sister, boyfriend's flower-protecting bar top-flowing niche". With Chen Feiyu's handsome appearance and height of 188 cm, Dad has power in the circle, naturally attracting many wealthy girls to covet. It is rumored that after he debuted, the chairman of the Yaolai Group, which is worth more than NT$50 billion, had a good impression on Chen Feiyu. At that time, Ouyang Nana was still her secret, so she said that Nana would help Nana to help. In the end, Chen Feiyu not only ignored these thousands of money, but also became a madman of Nana Weibo.


Ouyang Nana (left) once scored the secret group of the second generation of Fumei (right) and Wang Wenye (middle), but because Chen Feiyu was miserable by Bai Fumei. (Revolved from Evetinana Weibo)




Turning your face for love
The beauty that was held by the princess at a young age couldn’t stand this breath, and Wang Wen, the daughter of Wang Zhonglei, another well-known and one of the mainland’s heavyweight filmmakers, Wang Yilei, also kicked Ouyang Nana out of the sect. The sister group members also opened Ouyang Nana in IG: "Nima said that it is disgusting to kill me."


Qi beauty girlfriends together in IG cursed Ouyang Nana nausea, but also with "BITCH" call her. (Revolving from lilliannewu IG)

However, Ouyang Nana is not a fuel-efficient lamp. In the micro-blog, the sneakers are "skin-skin" for "to sacrifice the stars." However, Chen Feiyu is suspected of venting for Ouyang Nana, regardless of her own status as a public figure, and publicly pursuing the slogan of the popular black and white meat, Wang Bo black map, can be regarded as a career warfare.



Ouyang Nana once published the album cover of Chen Hao's "Guitar Hand" on Weibo. It is suspected that the secret is a "skin skin" for the pursuit of the stars. (Reviewed from Ouyang Nana Weibo)



Ouyang Nana once published the album cover of Chen Hao's "Guitar Hand" on Weibo. It is suspected that the secret is a "skin skin" for the pursuit of the stars. (Reviewed from Ouyang Nana Weibo)
